name: Puzzlez by hanleydev [3D]
description:
Ultimate Unity Game Jam Feb 2018 WINNING ENTRY!

Why is a hitman in a suit in a low poly forest? Whys the grass not real life green? Why is there birds chirping over this nice background music?

Just a few of the questions that will go unanswered as you overcome the obstacles to get through the end gate! Inspired by such puzzles found in Pokemon and other games.

Developer recommendations:
- The Strong potion enables moving of certain stone blocks - get them all to touch their corresponding obelisk to enable the switch to the final gate!
- Potions dont have cooldowns, switch between them frequently
- Have fun!

Controls... just move with WASD. Click Icons

This is a Third Person non-combat Puzzle game.
